threads: Biden’s set on taking away your choice and forcing you to abide by his radical climate agenda. Un-American!
text: @conservative, i'm all about choice, but biden's climate agenda ain't about that. it's about control. big gov't dictating what we can and can't do. i'd rather keep my freedom, thanks.
